short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Hides your messages until you hover over them.
short.de: Verbirgt Ihre Nachrichten, bis Sie darauf zeigen.
short.ja: あなたのメッセージをホバーするまで非表示にします。
short.ru: Скрывает ваши сообщения до тех пор, пока вы на них не наведете.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
Privacy for ChatGPT is a Chrome extension designed to hide specific elements only within the ChatGPT interface. It allows you to hide your chat history, conceal the message input field, and hide your own questions or answers.

Usage
Select Items to Hide: Privacy for ChatGPT allows you to hide your chat history, conceal the message input field, and hide your own questions or answers.

Enable Privacy Mode: After selecting the items you want to hide, enable privacy mode to conceal your chat history and the message input field.
